main event: On September 9, 1955, a round, white-yellow, extremely bright object was observed in NW Atlanta, GA for about 45 seconds to 1 minute.
interesting points: The observed object was described as being round and similar to a light bulb., The brightness of the object was noted to be extremely high., The object was identified by AGOCD as a B-36 aircraft with its scanner searchlight operating., The sighting occurred at 0705, shortly after dawn., There were numerous civilian aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a round, white-yellow, extremely bright object
